post.body: You're scary man.
Agree with you on the Japanese horror thing. Let me know about your sister's benefit when you get a chance.
Already got my vote.
What did you do on the site?
Excellent choice. Would love to here your version.
I just joined the #screenwriters group you formed. Guess they told the truth.
I'm registered on squidoo too. Just haven't done a lens yet.
Had to look that one up. Look delicious but complicated.
Tweet my well wishes on her birthday to her. I know she doesn't know me, but BD wishes from a stranger always make us happy.
Origami practice?
Thanks for the heads up on Angel. Accidently ordered 2. Anyone in LA area knows anyone who wants 2 buy. get it for $40
You've had the first two long enough that they nullify the third. Now if you get another within two years, well.....
Just be glad it wasn't all happening at the same time.
The "Being Single" entry left me LMAO! I can relate. But I'm going nowhere near cats. That's "the start" for a woman.
LMAO! Tina will be proud.
Love the makeover. How's the world treating you?
No doubt. I try to turn as many people as I can on to it. I don't want it losing the ratings game.
I'm more of a Super Jail gal.
Huh..you gave her a ring. That's kind of symbolic for a woman. You know that. Right?
She knows.
Did you get it figured out?
That's some big news! Congrats!
Are any of them not "reputable"? Just asking.
It's more a "I-don't-have-time-for-this-let's-move-on" attitude. Still hurts all the same, but I don't wallow in self pity over it.
Feeling you on that shutting down comment. It's a natural defense mechanism.
I hate it when that happens. I keep saying I'm going to buy an extra power cord, but I'd probably leave that somewhere else too.
Just got mine. Had it delievered to job. Injury kept me from coming in to get it Thur. and Fri. Happy now.
You are sadly right. It hurts to think how many live those lives from birth to death. We must ALWAYS think ourselves Blessed.
There are some seriously mature 12 year olds, but that's mostly physical rather than emotionally. We are a hormoned nation!
Overheard- I'm going to have to break down and get an ISP, bcuz whoever I'm siphoning off is not holding up their end of bootleg deal.
A letter from Joe Scarborough in the Opinion section of my hometown paper. Check out the comments. http://tinyurl.com/6yhvdb
RTing @NevadaGrey who is RTing @crackledotcom morning all! a little holiday cheer with your morning coffee: http://tinyurl.com/6esqaj
I'm so proud of my friend. She finished her teleplay. Super concept. Need to get cracking on mine.
Glad about that fact since I added too much sour cream. Can eat a little but not all. Changed what I bringing to polynesian meatballs.
Sitting here thinking about what I'm going to do with the green bean casserole I mistakenly made this weekend for ofc party. It's next mon.
A friend gave me a tamarind candy sucker with a salted plum (saltidos) in it. It was very good, imo. I love the taste of sweet and salty.
I just went to Macy's and sent a total of 5 minutes to find the perfect office gift for under $20. During their one day sale mind you.
RT @rahiemshabazz Let's show the power of twitter and find this missing girl. Retweet to all your followers http://tinyurl.com/5gdgcp
I just joined the Twitter Group http://twittgroups.com/group/screenwriters and you can too. Please Retweet.
I just joined the Twitter Group http://twittgroups.com/group/writers and you can too. Please Retweet.
RT @afrolicious: R you in need of a sustainable landscape designer/consultant/installer wiling to trade marketing services? Pls dm me r rt
My wireless earphones are my new best friend. Sorry Harvest Cheddar Sun Chips. You might get back in the running at lunch tomorrow.
I hate the fact that so many editoral cartoonists are getting laid off. They are a good barometer for what I should be paying attn to.
Retweeting @MyLifeInaCube: hey! this is pretty awesome. http://vimeo.com/2338998 @RobTornoe @dcagle have you guys seen this?
Burn Notice returns in Jan! Yeah!!! I need my fix.
Hi @giniscott Welcome to the Twitterverse. I see you're doing great things with the meetup. Sorry I'm not able to make it anymore.
RT @LSVideography http://tinyurl.com/6zsqq7 This is an absolutely beautiful slide show of their new baby. OMG It's so precious.
I love nature, but that noise is truly unnatural.
The 300 birds in the tree beside my front door must be drunk off eggnog. That's the only thing that can explain that racket they're making.
I just added something to the Twitter Group Wall at http://tgr.me/g/screenwriters so take a peek.
Thinking about proposals, I'd always thought how exciting for the woman, but never how it can't be any less exciting (and scary) for him.
It's a beautiful thing to see that my co-worker who is going to propose to his longtime gf tomorrow (shhh) at Xmas eve dinner is so excited.
RT @LAFD Did you know the LAFD has an on-line photo gallery? Here is a heartwarming tail.. er, tale: http://snipurl.com/91imf Be safe! Brian
My boss has a single foil wrapped chocolate santa taped to her door for her ofc decoration. I told her 1 day she'll find only the foil.
Love "Take Me or Leave Me" from RENT. And yes I know it's between two women. Getting ideas for what shows to see on my trip to NY in Jul.
Am I weird for loving the Modern Broadway channel on Yahoo! radio?
